oai_dc:dc.dc:title: AFL Expels Unions
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fred Wright
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Labor History, Other Unions, Red Scare
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: First Panel: Families passing food through a window to sit-in strikers. Second Panel: Strikers singing. Third Panel: John Frey testifying at the Un-American Committee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Fred Wright Original Cartoons (Subgroup 13.1), Fred Wright Papers (UE.13)
